price: 141. Ba oyo wana nde umma(1) baye baleka. Bakofutama na maye basalaki, bino mpe bokofutama na maye bosalaki. Bokotunama te na ntina na maye bango basalaki.
arabic: تِلۡكَ أُمَّةٞ قَدۡ خَلَتۡۖ لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتۡ وَلَكُم مَّا كَسَبۡتُمۡۖ وَلَا تُسۡـَٔلُونَ عَمَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: 1 Umma: Bótala na suratu oyo mokapo: 128.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: til'ka ummatun qad khalat lahā mā kasabat walakum mā kasabtum walā tus'alūna ʿammā kānū yaʿmalūna
